title: Mashed Potatoes with Half-and-Half and Sour Cream

Ingredients.1: 4 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces

Ingredients.2: 0.5 cup chicken broth, or more as needed

Ingredients.7: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Place potatoes in a slow cooker. Add chicken broth and garlic.

Directions.2: Cook until potatoes are fork-tender, 10 hours on Low or 4 1/2 hours on High. You may need to add more chicken broth if the potatoes get too dry.

Directions.3: Add sour cream, half-and-half, and butter to the slow cooker. For extra-creamy potatoes, use beaters to mix until potatoes are smooth and everything is incorporated. Season with salt and pepper.

Directions.4: Serve immediately, or cover and heat on Warm until the rest of dinner is ready.
